articles.title: 24x7 RTGS payment system available from today - Hindustan Times
articles.description: RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das had announced in October that the system will be available at all times from December 2020 to make online fund transfer smooth.
articles.content: The Real Time Gross Settlement System (RTGS) for high-value transactions will be available round-the-clock from Monday, making India one of the few countries in the world to operate the system 24X7.… [+1531 chars]

articles.content: As the Centre starts provisioning for one of the largest Covid-19 immunisation drives in the world, the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine candidate seems to be an outlier, at least for now. Senior government o… [+559 chars]

articles.title: Sadly, next four to six months could be the worst of COVID-19 pandemic: Bill Gates - Financial Express
UNESCO to launch international prize in the name of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib - All India Radio
articles.description: The UNESCO has decided to launch an international prize in the field of ‘creative economy’ in the name of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman.
articles.content: The UNESCO has decided to launch an international prize in the field of creative economy in the name of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman. Starting November 2021, the dollar 50 thousand award will be… [+940 chars]
